Question: Even before his arrival in Hollywood in 1947, this person wanted to add acting to his list of accomplishments.
Hints: A typical issue of Confidential in 1957 shouted, "Why ****'s Theme Song Should Be 'Mad About the Boy!'".
The huge success of this person's syndicated television show was the main impetus behind his record sales.
This person was particularly displeased with the frenetic camera work and his short appearance time.
